Basic Strategy - 2D S17

Double Deck, Dealer Stands on Soft 17

NOTE: NEVER PLAY IF BLACKJACKS PAY 6 TO 5

Hard Hands

| Player Total | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | 6 | 7 | 8 | 9 | T | A | | — | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | | Hard 4-7 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 8 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 9 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 10 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 11 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 12 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 13 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 14 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 15 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 16 | | | | | | | | | | | | Hard 17+ | | | | | | | | | | |

Soft Hands

| Player Total | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | 6 | 7 | 8 | 9 | T | A | | — | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | | A-2 (Soft 13) | | | | | | | | | | | | A-3 (Soft 14) | | | | | | | | | | | | A-4 (Soft 15) | | | | | | | | | | | | A-5 (Soft 16) | | | | | | | | | | | | A-6 (Soft 17) | | | | | | | | | | | | A-7 (Soft 18) | | | | | | | | | | | | A-8 (Soft 19) | | | | | | | | | | | | A-9 (Soft 20) | | | | | | | | | | |

Pairs

Legend

| Symbol | Action | | — | — | | | Hit | | | Stand | | | Double if possible, otherwise Hit | | | Double if possible, otherwise Stand | | | Split | | | Split if Double after splits allowed, otherwise Hit | | | Split if Double after splits allowed, otherwise Double | | | Surrender if possible, otherwise Hit | | | Surrender if possible, otherwise Stand | | | Surrender if possible, otherwise Split |
